title: who do you think is beter skt or fnatic

replies.body: No offence but, that's kinda a dumb question
why is it dumb
Cause SKT are going to win
I prefer cloud 9 tbh

I still think SKT...but its definitely a lot closer this year compared to last.

More interestingly EDG or FNC in the best of 5>???
I don't know if fnc can get that late game a littlie beter then they could win
FNC definitely have a much better chance vs EDG. But I am going for EDG =P the last hope of China.
lets face it only Korea will every win lcs worlds or anything els
EDG won at Mid Season Invitational =) they can do it again! Plus it's always fun rooting for the underdog story.
yer but its Korea

it was Korea that EDG beat at MSI (Mid Season Invitational)....so yeah...

But that was not with SKT strongest line up they played Easyhoon first 3 games, sure they won game 1 then lost the next 2. They started Faker for game 4 and he crushed, game 5 went to blind pick and EDG had a plan for his LB. I think the real reason for the game 5 loss was Wolf on Nautilus I don't think he had played a professional game on him at that point. 

SKT is looking in crushing form, better than anyone else at worlds upto this point

Lol I'm not debating which team is better. I said I am supporting the underdog story and what I meant by the MSI reference is there is a chance! =P 

SKT are definitely a great team.

SKT are probably the better team but if fnatic had the team experience that SKT do would definitely be a different story

I'm not too fussed about who is going to win worlds, but SKT T1 will probably win looking at how they are going right now

I wouldn't mind Fnatic though, to me their colour scheme looks really cool on their skins
I don't understand, what inspired you to ask this question... Like.... I don't even know if you're trolling or not
i think the better question would be, who will face skt in the finals, FNC or KT?
You don't actually think FNC will beat EDG at the quarters do you...
probs fnc

Straight out SKT are just a stronger team. If Faker can't carry Bang can, if Bang and Faker can't Carry Marin can. They've got three people on their team who can carry. Fnatic is a bit of a hit or miss. We saw Huni tilt week one, Febiven can be a bit inconsistent though I'd still rate him top 3 midlaners in world after seeing him play against faker and Rekkles can be interesting to say the least. Reignover honestly is a huge key, if he can help Huni or Feb they look decent, as long as Yellowstar and Rekkles at least break even then they have a good chance. Honestly Fnatic is going to have a hard time getting to the final with SKT, first game against EDG will be harder than they think it will be.

> [{quoted}](name=Typhlo,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=jKayMnMn,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-10-12T06:08:48.934+0000)
>
>Febiven top 3 midlaners in world


lol

SKT look stronger than anyone else at the tournament. I really like how Fnatic turned it around, but it would be a stretch to say they are looking as strong as SKT right now IMO.

I think in a best of 5, SKT would have the toughest time with the European style of play so Origen or Fnatic might actually have the biggest chance of an upset.  Even then I would still put SKT as massive favourites.

You could have said the same thing after the early stages of MSI though so you never know.

late game skt will win but the early game of fnc atm is so powerful. If they learn to pick a insane late game champ like {{champion:67}} instead of {{champion:85}} adc lol I think they could win as they would crush the first 20 min and just snow ball the game. You have to admit that fnc early game compered to skt is so much beter.

If you check the match history for that games Rekkles played as Kennen you'd honestly be surprised of how much damage was achieved. Part of it is Aoe but their not taking Kennen for that, they're taking Kennen for the stun and the escape he has. I disagree with statement FNC is better early game. SKT won 5/6 games in less than 30mins. Compare that to Fnatic who had 3 games go over 40mins.

Yep, I feel like the Kennen pick was for the following reasons, and none of them damage:

* Flexible pick advantage during the draft. People expected a top or support pick but he ended up as AD carry.

* AoE ultimate to protect the backline or even engage. When Febiven is doing that much damage, you can protect him and make him the main carry instead.

* Fast and safe tower/wave pushing. Kennen's AoE wave clear with Runaan's is really strong, and his naturally high attack speed means he can shred through towers.
 
It was an interesting, effective pick, but I'm not entirely sold on its viability just yet. Now that Fnatic's played that card, everyone can prepare for it now. But I trust that Fnatic has a few more awesome picks hidden up their sleeves.
SKT smoked all competition ever. Their current worlds standings are 47/1 lmao gg ez
